Questions.Question1: Acho que gostaria de utilizar [este] %VARIABLE% com frequência.

VariantGeneratorDescription: The portuguese translation of the SUS by Martins et al. is peer-reviewed and shows promising construct validity with significant correlations of the SUS scores with other usability metrics but showed less than satisfactory results for internal reliability. Therefore, reliability and validity might have to be investigated further.
